"Guh, there's no end! Where are they all: "Lady Harriet, we cannot hold this position! Let us retreat to the rearguard!"
"Rgh...! If we were to do that...!"
"To lose you here would be an unforgivable travesty! Lady Harriet, I beg of you...!"
"...Very well."
"Varuna, sound the order to retreat. We will withdraw back to Cuent and hold them there."
"Ma'am! I will do so at once...!"
"Wh-What in the world?!"
"Enemies are approaching from Cuent's direction!"
"W-We'll be surrounded! To the queen's side!"
"Lady Harriet, it's too dangerous here! Reckless as it may be, we must break through! Stay as close to us as you can!"
"Why are Demons still appearing with neither Castle nor summoner around...?!"
"My lady, the lake is clear of enemies! Flee by boat! I will stay and hold them off!"
"Varuna!"
"You need not be concerned! I will return to you without fail! Go! Protect Lady Harriet!"
"Sir!"
"Varuna! Varuna!"
"There shouldn't be any Demons around here..."
"...Ah! Even more...?"
"The Guardian will surely pull through. So until then... I cannot allow myself to fall!"
"Haah!"
"Aagh!"
"Guh... Ugh...!"
"(Brother...! Guardian...!)"
"Ah... Aaah...! You have come at last, Guardian...!"
"I believed you would... I truly did...! I am so relieved... Now, the world can be as one...!"
"...Say, Guardian. Where is Xiera?"
"Heh, heheheh, gahahaha!"
"You're much sharper than I imagined. I go through all the trouble of putting on this disguise, and you won't even humor me."
"You are... Elmir?!"
"Why the surprise? You've known since long ago that I still lived, have you not?"
"Are you saying you're... immortal?"
"Hahah! Life and death have no meaning whatsoever within this world, you know."
"What are you...?"
"Your precious Guardian has been hard at work. It won't be long now before war is but a thing of the past."
"They have made a truly impressive, praiseworthy effort here."
"[Elder], [Loser], [Apprentice], [Double]. All Factors have been graciously returned to the earth."
"All that remains are you and I."
"So you see now, Harriet. Or should I say, Vessel of Ephimera."
"Vessel of...Ephimera...?"
"The Spirit of Ephimera, and the Vessel of Ephimera. When both pieces become one, the world too, shall become one."
"Rejoice! For your wish will finally come true! I trust you have no objections, Harriet?"
"No... You can't...! If you do that, everything will...!"
"Now then, let us perform a miracle! One that shall rend the world asunder!"
"Cuent Soldier"
